trans-unit.source: Used to create a placeholder object whenever the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized*> method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilizado para criar um marcador de posição objeto sempre que o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> do controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized*>método devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized*>

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set provides an authorization mechanism for determining whether individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls can be added to a page.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de controlo de peças Web fornece um mecanismo de autorização para determinar se individuais <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos podem ser adicionados a uma página.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Developers can optionally assign an arbitrary string to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Os programadores, opcionalmente, podem atribuir uma cadeia arbitrária para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>propriedade um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control is adding controls to a page, it checks this filter value against criteria set by the developer, by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A> method, and returns `false` if a control is not authorized.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo é adicionar controlos para uma página, verifica este valor de filtro com os critérios definidos pelo programador, utilizando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A>método e devolve `false` se um controlo não está autorizado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This mechanism also works with server controls and user controls that are placed in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones, because these controls are wrapped with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object at run time, and this object inherits the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Este mecanismo também funciona com os controlos de servidor e controlos de utilizador que são colocados em <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zonas, porque estes controlos são moldados com um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>objeto em tempo de execução e este objeto herda o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is not authorized, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control inserts an UnauthorizedWebPart control into the control tree of the page in place of the unauthorized control.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo não está autorizado, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo insere um controlo UnauthorizedWebPart na árvore de controlo da página em vez do controlo não autorizado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: An UnauthorizedWebPart control in the control tree reserves the position of the unauthorized control in the page, and prevents any personalization data that a user might have previously applied to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control from being lost.
trans-unit.target: Um controlo UnauthorizedWebPart na árvore de controlo reserva-se a posição do controlo não autorizado na página e impede que os dados de personalização que um utilizador poderá anteriormente aplicadas à <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo da perda.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The UnauthorizedWebPart control is never displayed on a page in which it is inserted, nor does it appear in the source code for the rendered page.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de UnauthorizedWebPart nunca é apresentado uma página na qual é inserido nem, é apresentada com o código de origem para a página composto.

trans-unit.source: Developers can verify its presence in the page control tree by checking the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Os programadores podem verificar a presença na árvore de controlo da página ao verificar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart"></xref> control, called when a static <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control (or server or user control) fails authorization.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart"> </xref> controlo, chamado quando static <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo (ou controlo de utilizador ou servidor) recusa a autorização.

trans-unit.source: The UnauthorizedWebPart constructor takes a static control `webPart` as a parameter, where `webPart` has failed an authorization check.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de UnauthorizedWebPart demora um controlo estático `webPart` como um parâmetro, onde `webPart` falhou uma verificação de autorização.

trans-unit.source: A static control is one that is declared in the markup of a Web page, rather than being added programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Um controlo estático é aquele que está declarado na marcação de uma página Web, em vez de ser adicionada através de programação.

trans-unit.source: The constructor returns a new instance of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control, which is added to the page's control tree in place of `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: O construtor devolve uma nova instância de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart>controlo, que é adicionado à árvore de controlo da página em vez de `webPart`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that has failed to be authorized by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> que falhou ao ser autorizado pelo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart"></xref> control, called when a dynamic <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control (or server or user control) fails authorization.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart"> </xref> controlo, chamado quando um dinâmico <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo (ou controlo de utilizador ou servidor) recusa a autorização.

trans-unit.source: The UnauthorizedWebPart constructor is called when a dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control fails its authorization check.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de UnauthorizedWebPart será chamado sempre que um dinâmico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>ou outro controlo de servidor falha a verificação de autorização.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A dynamic control is one that is added to a page programmatically, or by a user from a catalog of Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: O controlo dinâmico é aquela que é adicionado a uma página através de programação ou por um utilizador a partir do catálogo de peças Web controla.

trans-unit.source: The UnauthorizedWebPart constructor returns a new instance of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control to replace the dynamic control that failed authorization.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de UnauthorizedWebPart devolve uma nova instância de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart>controlo para substituir o controlo dinâmico que falhou a autorização.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the original server or user control that was added to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> to participate in a Web Parts application.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém o ID do controlo de servidor ou o utilizador original que foi adicionado a um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> participar numa aplicação de peças Web.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the original control's type.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia contendo o nome do tipo original do controlo.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the relative virtual path to the user control, if the original control is a user control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém o caminho virtual relativo para o controlo de utilizador, se o controlo original é um controlo de utilizador.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the ID of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control that wraps the original server or user control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém o ID de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"> </xref> controlo que encapsula num wrapper o controlo de servidor ou o utilizador original.
